common_issues.title: Pieces OS macOS App LTM and Workstream Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing problems with the Pieces OS macOS app, specifically with the LTM and Workstream functionalities. Issues include LTM queries taking too long or returning nothing, Workstream not updating, and inability to open Pieces Core Services.  Some users report success after clearing Pieces data, but the issue reoccurs.  A potential cause is the LTM becoming too large.  The "Clear LTM Data" button is also reported as not functioning.

related_issues.title: Bug: Subscription is not showing up within the Application(cancelation + resubscription w/ a new plan)
related_issues.text:
Bug: Subscription is not showing up within the Application(cancelation + resubscription w/ a new plan)
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

So when I freshly install Pieces, the LTM works fine.

When I've had it running for a few weeks, and I want to query the LTM, the query takes forever, and returns nothing.

The same happens via the MCP.

I use my machine all day, so there's a lot of context going into the LTM. The only explanation I can come up with is that it's just getting too big. The Workstream is, however, updating fine.

Removing all my Pieces data gets the LTM working again, but then I end up with this situation later. This is the third time I've been through this loop. It's really frustrating, because when I actually need the LTM, it fails.

The Clear LTM Data button doesn't work, just returning to Try again, from All Data to even for just clearing an hour of data.

I haven't cleared the LTM (well, I've tried, but the Clear LTM Data button doesn't work) so we have a live broken environment to debug with. I'm more than happy to assist with debugging this - let me know what you need!

common_issues.title: PiecesOS services failing to open on MacOS
common_issues.description: Multiple users reported Pieces Settings and Core Services failing to open on MacOS.  Errors include "Type ZJb already registered" and websocket connection failures with 404 status code. Issues appear on MacOS 15.5 and 15.7 with Pieces OS versions 12.1.1 and Unknown. Check Pieces OS installation and port configuration. Ensure no conflicting applications are using port 39300.

common_issues.title: Pieces Copilot Service fails to open on MacOS
common_issues.description: Users are unable to open the Pieces Copilot Service on MacOS.  Two distinct errors are observed: "Instance of 'fp'" and "HttpException: Connection reset by peer." Affected users are running MacOS versions 15.5 and 15.6 with Pieces OS versions 11.0.4 and 12.1.1. The issue might be related to Pieces OS version incompatibility or network connectivity problems. Check if Pieces OS is updated to the latest version and ensure a stable network connection. Further investigation is needed to pinpoint the root cause of the 'fp' instance error.

common_issues.title: Pieces Pro Upgrade and Connectivity Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulty upgrading to Pieces Pro, encountering unresponsive upgrade buttons and failure to open payment modals.  Additionally, some users report connectivity problems between Pieces OS and browser extensions, even with VPN configurations.  Further investigation into payment gateway integration and network connectivity is needed.

related_issues.title: Pieces Pro: checkout is not opening
related_issues.text: Pieces Pro: checkout is not opening ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Hi guys! I want to try a "Pro" plan, however the modal with payment is not opening and the button "Upgrade Now" turns to "Awaiting checkout..." and nothing happens. I've tried through the Desktop App, Pieces OS app - neither helped. Could you please advice? Default Browser: Arc (if it helps) PiecesOs Log Attached [log-08102025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/21704376/log-08102025.txt) Pieces for Developers log string: ``` [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 [D] App Interaction: app_header_searchbar_settings_button_popover_button [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 [D] Dispatching Route [DIALOG OPEN]: true [D] Dispatching Route [SHEET OPEN]: false [D] Dispatching Route [CURRENT ROUTE]: PiecesProInformationDialog [D] Dispatching Route [ROUTE STACK]: [/workstream, PiecesProInformationDialog] [D] Dispatching Route [ENTRY]: / [D] Dispatching Route [HOME]: /workstream [D] App Interaction: app_header_searchbar_settings_button_popover_upgrade_to_pro_button [D] Dispatching Route [DIALOG OPEN]: false [D] Dispatching Route [SHEET OPEN]: false [D] Dispatching Route [CURRENT ROUTE]: /workstream [D] Dispatching Route [ROUTE STACK]: [/workstream] [D] Dispatching Route [ENTRY]: / [D] Dispatching Route [HOME]: /workstream [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 ``` Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. related_issues.title: Pieces extension for Chrome & edge cannot connect to pieces OS
related_issues.text: Pieces extension for Chrome & edge cannot connect to pieces OS ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Web Extension, Pieces OS ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Even if the VPN for the browser plugin is turned off, and the virtual network card and global proxy for the desktop VPN are turned on, it is still not possible to connect the browser, including the edge and Chrome pieces plugins, to the pieces OS. PS: My pieces OS and pieces for developers are both installed in sequence on Microsoft Store. - They work well in other aspects. - I have been using them for about 7 days. - I am in Chinese Mainland, thus a heavy VPN user. - Pieces OS has been upgraded to Pro. common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop Application Bugs
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various bugs in the Pieces desktop application, including dragging files into conversation context, hotkeys not working, and automatic redirection to support on launch.  These issues span different operating systems (Windows and macOS) and Pieces OS versions (12.1.0, 12.1.1, 12.2.0).  Further investigation is needed to identify the root causes and solutions.

related_issues.title: CANNOT drag a file into CONVERSATION CONTEXT
related_issues.text:
CANNOT drag a file into CONVERSATION CONTEXT
### Checked for Existing Issues?

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

1. CANNOT drag a file into CONVERSATION CONTEXT
2. the window for file choosing sometimes pops out back (not front)
3. filter rules only applies to certain files, for example, .jsonl is excluded

recommendations: Prioritize resolving issues related to Pieces OS macOS app's LTM and Workstream functionalities, focusing on improving query performance, ensuring Workstream updates, and fixing the "Clear LTM Data" button.

Investigate and address the problems preventing users from opening Pieces Core Services, Settings Service, and Copilot Service on MacOS, focusing on resolving websocket connection failures, port conflicts, and the "Type ZJb already registered" error.
Troubleshoot and fix the issues users are facing when upgrading to Pieces Pro, specifically the unresponsive upgrade button and payment modal failures.
Address the bugs reported in the Pieces desktop application, including file dragging into conversation context, non-functional hotkeys, and automatic redirection to support on launch.
Improve communication with users experiencing connectivity issues between Pieces OS and browser extensions, especially those using VPN configurations.
